selectedVerses.text: Now Peter and those who were with him were heavy with sleep, but when they became fully awake they saw his glory and the two men who stood with him.
When a strong man, fully armed, guards his own palace, his goods are safe;
Therefore, preparing your minds for action, and being sober-minded, set your hope fully on the grace that will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
For we are not writing to you anything other than what you read and acknowledge and I hope you will fully acknowledge--
fully convinced that God was able to do what he had promised.
